description:
Speak Better German Today: Effective and Easy German Grammar for Beginners

Are you a complete beginner when it comes to the German language? Or someone who sat through lots of lessons in school and felt bored and confused?

Don't give up on one of the most important languages in the world today!

German is a language spoken by millions of people and one of the Top 5 Desirable Languages in UK Employer Surveys according to the Goethe Institute.

It's normal to get stuck when you are trying to make sense of complicated grammar books. But let me assure you:

  • You are not too old to learn a language
  • You are not too stupid to learn a language
  • You are not too forgetful

Want some proof? Then take this course and discover German grammar with simple, straightforward explanations in English.

I have taught German for three years and have worked with American CEOs, Chinese students and EU-approved translators. The best way of learning is always to have complex rules explained in simple terms.

For everyone who has a phrasebook gathering dust on the shelf, try working with me and using:

  • Simple explanations from a friendly and fun teacher
  • In-depth Workbooks full of exercises that will help you test yourself
  • Quizzes that assess your knowledge step by step
  • Real life examples of German grammar "in the wild"


Wouldn't you love to learn at your own pace and access lessons whenever you need to?

The course covers every topic that the beginning learner needs. It is developed to match the content of leading course books, for example Menschen and Deutsch Plus.

Kerstin makes it easy, exciting and gives elegant examples that take zero effort to learn, though we cannot promise that a little effort won't go a long way once you start using this knowledge. (Anthony Metivier, Magnetic Memory Method and author of the Udemy Course How to Memorize the Vocabulary of Any Language)

If you take Easy German Grammar for Beginners, you'll have the foundation to become a confident speaker and learner of German.
title: Easy German Grammar for Complete Beginners
